label: 俗別当
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a secular administrator of a temple in Heian times, often a high ranking courtier on the Council of State (Daijôkan) or in the Royal Secretariat (Kurôdodokoro). [太政官] [蔵人所]
